title: Chorba frik
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 pinch Cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', '1L vegetable stock', '4 tablespoons frik, crushed wheat', '1/2 tin chickpeas', 'handful each parsley and coriander, chopped', '4 sprigs mint leaves, chopped', '1 lemon']
